lblLandingText1: We still need some information, but in a few steps you are good to go ðŸ¥³
lblLandingText2: Please enter your mediabeam.com address below. Then we can assign you to a team.
lblLandingText3Apple: To support your team, the app needs access to Apple Health. Please make sure beforehand that Apple Health is also installed on your device.
lblLandingText3Google: In order to support your team, the app needs access to Google Fit. Please make sure beforehand that Google Fit is also installed on your device.
lblDashboardUserStatsConnectErrorApple: The app cannot access the data from Apple Health.
lblDashboardUserStatsConnectErrorGoogle: The app cannot access the data from Google Fit.
lblWeekChallengeDescription: Challenge accepted! Try to collect 210 points for your team every week.ðŸ¤˜
lblTeamChallengeDescription: Will we be able to cover the distance from A to B together? 5 points result in one kilometer.
